Text: Holy chan! You have come back from the dead?
This is one of my favorites. Thanks so much for all your hard work!

Something seems to be wrong for me. When I run this file in Media Player Classic, everything on my PC slows down. The memory usage for MPC grows exponentially. The running of the movie itself is then also affected - it lags, processes, stops etc.

The same thing happened when I tried playing it in Windows Media Player.

Anyone else having this problem? I never had such issues with HR's old handheld ups before.

And other movies play fine on my system.
its the same as any other.  use vlc anyhow.
Okay, works fine with VLC, but still same problems with other 2 players. Hmmm...
don't know, this is an entirely automated build process.  They are all the same.
Big brother is watching this one, beware! Notice of copyright infringement warnings may follow
